files.patch:
@@ -1,21 +0,0 @@
-[package]
-authors = ["The Rust Project Developers"]
-name = "rustc_trans_traits"
-version = "0.0.0"
-
-[lib]
-name = "rustc_trans_traits"
-path = "lib.rs"
-crate-type = ["dylib"]
-test = false
-
-[dependencies]
-ar = "0.3.0"
-flate2 = "0.2"
-owning_ref = "0.3.3"
-
-syntax = { path = "../libsyntax" }
-rustc = { path = "../librustc" }
-rustc_back = { path = "../librustc_back" }
-rustc_incremental = { path = "../librustc_incremental" }
-rustc_trans_utils = { path = "../librustc_trans_utils" }
